channel.title: ~ Project Elysium ~ 317 ~ Old School Feel ~ Fresh & New ~ Economy ~
channel.description:
[center][center][url=http://www.rune-server.org/runescape-development/rs2-server/advertise/566155-project-elysium-317-old-school-feel-fresh-new-economy.html#post4644568][IMG]http://i.imgur.com/1qLKdZ0.gif[/img][/url][/center][/center]
First off, I would like to personally thank you for actually looking at this thread.
Introduction; Project Elysium is a side project me and a friend have been working on. We've been working really hard on this for awhile, tried to make it one of the best servers around, and we believe we can make it there eventually. This server is in Open Beta at the moment, and very new so expect some issues, hopefully nothing major since we covered tons during the closed beta. We are always adding new content day by day, hour by hour, we actually listen to what players have to say, and take suggestions into consideration. Give us a shot, you wont and shouldn't regret it!
[center][IMG]http://i.imgur.com/N3HNxJi.png[/img]
[url=http://www.project-elysium.com/]Homepage[/url]|[url=http://www.project-elysium.com/forum/]Forums[/url]|[url=http://www.project-elysium.com/forum/index.php?page=download]Client[/url]|[url=http://www.project-elysium.com/forum/index.php?page=faq]FAQ[/url]|[url=http://www.project-elysium.com/vote]Vote[/url]|[url=https://rspsdata.org/system/store.php?id=720]Donate[/url]
[IMG]http://i.imgur.com/PUCEvyk.png[/img][/center]
What is Project Elysium? Project Elysium is a 317 old school based server with a new school touch. This touch can be anywhere from items, to client interface, to animations, but we try to keep it as old school as possible. This is a Beta release hoping to become the official release in the near future. Also, this is my first 'official' released server, and putting lots of effort, attention, work, and time into it.
Oh, this is just a typical 317 sever. No it's not. It's a dedicated one with a dedicated programmer. Give us a shot, and maybe a few to correct ourselves.
"Leeched" How so? Most of the things in this source have been removed, it may not look like something special [i]right now[/i] but guarantee in the future it will be something special.
[center][IMG]http://i.imgur.com/NWB2Vd4.png[/img] • 317 w/ HP & Prayer orbs • Custom Pking Minigame • Dragon Claws • Donation System • Dedicated VPS & Webhost • DDOS Protected VPS • All skills function properly • Balanced economy • Decent PvP • Excellent PvM & Drops • PvP Gear (Vesta, Statius..) • Clipped Following • Clipped Firemaking • No dupes (yet).. • Vote System • 24/7 Uptime • Character Backups • One of a kind • New content every day • Dedicated Programmer • Excellent community • Quests! (soon..) • Just Dedication [/center]
Enough of that...
[center][IMG]http://i.imgur.com/Ov1blKn.png[/img][/center]
[center] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/u1DdX9w.png[/img] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/SE2Vml0.png[/img] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/LBLldMh.png[/img] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/02bfxJZ.png[/img] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/ZD0rrKD.png[/img] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/FSGAfZr.png[/img] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/imLrHLn.png[/img] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/pEbJyN4.png[/img] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/sCzlSJI.png[/img] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/1Pkf0wN.png[/img] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/A97VlrN.png[/img] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/jHh44nr.png[/img] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/7C6Xf36.png[/img] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/cf8sgVb.png[/img] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/wrsAgfH.png[/img] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/KiY17Cv.png[/img] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/znqj5DL.png[/img] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/xYIVqH4.png[/img] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/wtDWtp9.png[/img] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/lg4Vxtk.png[/img] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/53fUsp0.png[/img] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/lapSFBC.png[/img] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/xfjTZ1T.png[/img] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/85LtcX7.png[/img] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/1AIx8Xq.png[/img] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/VaJT4k5.png[/img] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/c7i0Tkt.png[/img] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/Vl7o1vq.png[/img] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/nmsurzp.png[/img] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/EUmpcO7.png[/img] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/ChKLab2.png[/img] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/K3HscKD.png[/img] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/kTuIGBe.png[/img] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/OrHez9t.png[/img] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/wOqdQhs.png[/img] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/4Cew5jY.png[/img] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/4Bd4xm6.png[/img] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/6yQfwKJ.png[/img] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/tpwqYI8.png[/img] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/KYRqoOE.png[/img] [/center]

item.description:
@Tylwr wrote:

[center][center][/center][/center]

First off, I would like to personally thank you for actually looking at this thread.

Introduction;
Project Elysium is a side project me and a friend have been working on. We’ve been working really hard on this for awhile, tried to make it one of the best servers around, and we believe we can make it there eventually. This server is in Open Beta at the moment, and very new so expect some issues, hopefully nothing major since we covered tons during the closed beta. We are always adding new content day by day, hour by hour, we actually listen to what players have to say, and take suggestions into consideration. Give us a shot, you wont and shouldn’t regret it!

[center]

Homepage|Forums|Client|FAQ|Vote|Donate

[/center]

What is Project Elysium?
Project Elysium is a 317 old school based server with a new school touch. This touch can be anywhere from items, to client interface, to animations, but we try to keep it as old school as possible. This is a Beta release hoping to become the official release in the near future. Also, this is my first ‘official’ released server, and putting lots of effort, attention, work, and time into it.

Oh, this is just a typical 317 sever.
No it’s not. It’s a dedicated one with a dedicated programmer. Give us a shot, and maybe a few to correct ourselves.

"Leeched"
How so? Most of the things in this source have been removed, it may not look like something special right now but guarantee in the future it will be something special.

[center]
• 317 w/ HP & Prayer orbs
• Custom Pking Minigame
• Dragon Claws
